Title: Relates to the definition of class two bicycles with electric assist
Summary: Specifies that class two bicycles with electric assist shall be those for which the electric motor cannot provide assistance when such bicycles reach a speed of twenty-eight miles per hour.
LawCode: Amd ยง102-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the definition of class two bicycles with electric assist
